page.title: 15LAW AND ORDER
page.content: There is not much crime in Kislingbury because it's a small village and there are not many nightclubs in the area.Over the{M1} there is a bridge which has a {SPEED {TRAP}because drivers go too fast over the bridge. In Harpole the police are very good. They work in different regions. There is never much free time at the station.Over the county there are only eight police dogs.There is not much crime but that there is, is usually committed by men rather than women . There is not much lost property but when it is handed in it goes straight to{CAMPBELL SQUARE, {NORTHAMPTON.}The most common crime in Harpole is theft.Also people are more aware of crimes so they put more locks on doors and windows.
